# External resources for data analysis {.unnumbered}

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Here are a few links to external resources on data analysis and statistics.

-   [The R Psychologist, by \@magnussonCohend](https://rpsychologist.com/) - is an outstanding resource to better understand statistics
-   [Online Modules in Research Methods and Data Analysis](https://lo.unisa.edu.au/course/view.php?id=8481) at the University of South Australia
-   [Data Analysis](https://libraryguides.unh.edu/excel/analysis) from the University of New Hampshire
